backend/main.mo: Defines actor with storage, auth mixins, and types plus state for files, folders, notes, missions, and upload tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing one feature about suppressing automated toasts and its associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Summary map describing roles and behaviors of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation outlining creation of Draft baseline synced 1:1 with Live version 114 including validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry configuring PWA metadata, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑freeze notice prohibiting modifications until explicit user approval after restoring Live v114 baseline.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app identity, theme, icons, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, runtime caching, navigation fallback, and cache cleanup.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Checklist for verifying Chrome PWA installability requirements including manifest, service worker, and icons.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming frontend restored to exact Live v114 behavior with verification of components, flows, and configs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring providers, theme, intro logic, homepage, and upload queue runner.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing actor initialization errors with details, retry, and logout options.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated target-style gallery icon with hover transitions.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: File exists but contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed subtle bottom divider line for page decoration.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Displays a dialog when a file cannot be opened in a new window, offering retry and download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Shows a dialog with file metadata and preview support for images, videos, PDFs, and office files, with actions like download, open, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file, link, and note uploads with Web Worker processing, speech-to-text for notes, and backend upload integration.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Renders a floating button that opens the folders interface.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated modal for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folders manager supporting creation, renaming, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen file viewer with swipe navigation, external open, download, delete, share, and folder/mission actions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes in a gallery with selection, long‑press actions, and viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, auth menu, and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a brief splash animation and fades out before calling onComplete.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog offering retry or copy options when a browser blocks opening a link.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button to start Internet Identity login with loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission view handling tasks, autosave, and attached file/note viewing.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating a new mission with title and task management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions section with animated styling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Mobile-friendly full-screen mission list with swipe actions, filtering, creation, deletion, and navigation to mission details.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper component that constrains children to a mobile-only layout container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for selecting a mission and moving selected files or notes into it with success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog to view, download, share, move, or delete a single note.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog to move files or notes to a folder or return them to the main collection, with performance diagnostics.
Swipeable row component exposing edit and delete actions with gesture handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar summarizing active uploads and their progress.
frontend/src/components/UploadQueueRunne: Restores persisted uploads when the backend actor becomes ready and resumes them with concurrency limits, updating progress and completing items as they finish.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Displays a centered welcome screen with an animated SVG target icon and introductory text plus a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages creation, retry logic, state, and errors for the backend actor based on Internet Identity, including optional admin token initialization.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Provides context for managing upload items, batching, progress updates, and completion handling with throttled state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates or fetches an actor using react-query, initializing access control as needed and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once when the actor becomes ready to speed up home screen data loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login flow, status tracking, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Triggers a callback when the app regains focus or visibility, but only after identity is initialized and authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer (e.g., touch) and updates on pointer type changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements debounced mission autosaving with mutation queuing, mission change handling, and deep state comparison.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and updating missions with actor readiness checks and targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting notes with folder/mission scoping and concurrency‑limited mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Offers React Query hooks for file and folder operations, including paginated fetches, uploads with concurrency limits, and folder creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: React hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition with final/interim transcript handling, error reporting, and lifecycle cleanup.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive light/dark theme CSS variables and mobile layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main home page managing authentication state, data prefetching, folder/mission views, and optional development smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Helpers and constants for classifying actor initialization errors and extracting error details.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities to open external URLs, download files or notes, and share files via Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Logic determining how files open (viewer, office preview, or download) based on MIME category.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies MIME types into preview categories and provides labels, plus a helper to check if a file is previewable.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Computes mission progress, determines mission completion, and splits missions into completed and incomplete lists.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Provides a BigInt‑safe equality check for task arrays by comparing IDs, text, and completion flags.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements optional performance timing utilities with start/end logging and an async operation timer.
IndexedDB‑backed upload queue that persists files, tracks progress, and restores items across reloads.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mutation lifecycle events in development mode for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development‑only backend smoke tests for folder, mission, link, and note creation and formats results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Creates a concurrency limiter that restricts how many async tasks run simultaneously.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/workers/fileBytes.worker.ts: Web worker that reads file bytes off the main thread and returns them or an error.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom radius, OKLCH color variables, sidebar and feature-specific palettes, and accordion animations.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Lists all frontend files that define the v114 baseline for validation and drift detection.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, and a new request focused on suppressing automated in-app toast messages.
